name: GLMall
author: GLMall

sections.description:
GLMall is an online marketplace that allows online shops to sell their products in Fiat (via backlink to WooCommerce shop) or sell them on GLMall in the platforms native utility token (GMBT) without any gas fees. By utilizing GLMall’s unique parallel coin solution and eliminating gas fees, this marketplace is the first application of is kind allowing buyers and sellers to choose between fiat or crypto for their daily buying and selling needs.

• Flexibility for the merchants and buyers to sell and buy in fiat or crypto
• Reach an expanded buyer pool due to representation on a global/local Marketplace
• Targeted advertising features across the platform and all social media channels
• No gas or other fees related to crypto purchases for the buyer
• Smart agreements governing all sales/purchase orders
• Influencer marketing and commission distribution through the blockchain

How does this work?

  • The plugin V1.0.0 work as one-way push/sync for products from WooCommerce to your GLMall shop.
  • You can manual push products to your GLMall shop, either through one by one push or bulk push. The first push will create the product in your GLMall shop and any push after that will update the product in your GLMall shop.
  • Automatic push/sync the product to your GLMall shop. In the plugin settings page you can enable the auto-push feature. This will automatically sync all changes made to a product in WooCommerce to your GLMall shop without any further manual pushes needed.

Links

https://glmall.glbrain.com/

Dependency Plugin

WooCommerce, We test with WooCommerce v7.1.0

Software as a Service is permitted

• GLMall Restfull API
The plugin is working with GLMall Restfull API, (https://api.glbrain.com/). It is a public API that provides the services to push/synchronize products from the WooCommerce system to your GLMall shop.

• Third party libraries
– Bootstrap v5.2.3 (https://getbootstrap.com/), Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/blob/main/LICENSE)
– AES implementation in PHP (Chris Veness 2005-2014 www.movable-type.co.uk/scripts), Right of free use is granted for all commercial or non-commercial use under CC-BY license. (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

Features

  • Manually push products one by one from WooCommerce to your GLMall shop.
  • Bulk push multiple products from WooCommerce to your GLMAll shop.
  • Auto push/sync update products to your GLMall shop whenever you create / edit / delete products on WooCommerce.
  • Settings to enable/disable auto push feature.
  • Product category mapping between WooCommerce and your GLMall shop.
  • Product attribute mapping between WooCommerce and your GLMall shop.
  • Fully responsive.
